message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get a little more since the value decreases for me each round.
Let's split it evenly, Alice. It's only fair since I don't lose any value.
Bob, time is running out for both of us. This is a slight improvement on my previous offer - let's be reasonable and close the deal.
Alice, the value of the money doesn't change for me, but it does for you. I'm willing to take a bit more, considering the circumstances.
